name: Death Arrow
text: Through ancient ceremonies and whispers of vengeance, you bind within your arrows all the rage and indignation you possess. The process transforms each arrow into a macabre length of polished bone capped with a jagged tip and fitted with black fletching. When you fire these wicked barbs from your bow, they bite deep, delivering death’s fatal message.

features.brutalArrows(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to make a ranged or an area attack, you can reroll any of the attack’s damage dice that come up as a 1 or a 2
features.rattlingArrows(11thLevel): Whenever you hit an enemy with a ranged attack and are hidden from that enemy, all enemies adjacent to the target take a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn
features.deathArrows(16thLevel): Whenever you hit an enemy currently affected by your Rattling Arrows penalty, your can score a critical hit on a roll of 18–20

flavorText: Let my black arrow be the answer to your violation.
